transcript: a dumb person makes their own mistake and then repeats it a smart person learns from their mistakes a wise person learns from the mistakes of others and so you can live multiple lifetimes of lessons simply by allowing other people to share their lessons and their mistakes with you and then taking the lesson without the scar I've learned so many of those lessons from Uncle Charlie and Uncle Warren that I've just been able to apply into a modern-day business environment just in my own life
